      Modifier and Type Method Description
      byte[] vimryptoAsym.decryptAsymmetric​(byte[] ciphered)
      Decrypt using shared key derived from assymetric keys and AES-GCM with random IV
      byte[] vimryptoAsym.decryptAsymmetricIES​(byte[] ciphered)
      Decrypt using shared key derived from assymetric keys and ECIES (AES-CBC)
      AEAD vimryptoAsym.decryptAsymmetricWithAEAData​(byte[] message)
      Decrypt AEAD message ciphered with key derived from assymetric keys
      byte[] vimryptoSym.decryptSymmetric​(byte[] ciphered)
      Decrypt using using symmetric key and salt.
      AEAD vimryptoSym.decryptSymmetricWithAEAData​(byte[] message)
      Decrypt AEAD message
      static java.security.PrivateKey KeyReader.deserializePrivateKey​(byte[] keyBytes)
      Reads private key from most standard and compatible representation (ASN.1 in PKSC#8) Compatible with OpenSSL.
      static java.security.PublicKey KeyReader.deserializePublicKey​(byte[] keyBytes)
      Reads public key from most standard and compatible representation (ASN.1 in X509) Compatible with OpenSSL.
      byte[] vimryptoAsym.ecdheStep1()
      Performs ephemeral key EC Diffie-Hallman step1: generates temporary key pair, signs teporary public key with real private key.
      byte[] vimryptoAsym.ecdheStep2​(byte[] signedEphemeralPubKey)
      Performs step 2 of ephemeral key EC Diffie-Hallman: takes signed key form other side, verifies signature, makes ECDH using temporary keys, hashes and returns shared key.This key then should be used for symmetric encryption.
      byte[] vimryptoAsym.encryptAsymmetric​(byte[] plain)
      Encrypt using shared key derived from assymeric keys and AES-GCM with random IV.Note that all 12 bytes of IV will prefix message.
      byte[] vimryptoAsym.encryptAsymmetricIES​(byte[] plain)
      Encrypt using shared key derived from assymeric keys and ECIES (AES-CBC)
      AEADMessage vimryptoAsym.encryptAsymmetricWithAEAData​(byte[] plain, byte[] aeadata)
      Encrypt plain text, using keys derived from assymertic keys; add unencrypted authenticated associated data
      byte[] vimryptoSym.encryptSymmetric​(byte[] plain)
      Encrypt using keys abd IV set by setSymmetricKey(), setSymmetricSalt(), setSymmetricNounce();
      AEADMessage vimryptoSym.encryptSymmetricWithAEAData​(byte[] plain, byte[] aeadata)
      Encrypt plain text, using keys abd IV setted by setSymmetricKeyIV(); add unencrypted authenticated associated data
      static java.security.PublicKey KeyReader.extractPublicKeyFromX509​(java.security.cert.X509Certificate c)  
      byte[] vimryptoExt.reverseSchemeDecryptAndVerify​(byte[] encrypted_and_signed, byte[] preSharedSecret)
      Decrypts message with derived from sender's public key and pre-shaered secret.
      void vimryptoExt.setSymmetricKey​(byte[] key)
      Set key for AES/GCM which is used for symmetrical encryption.
      void vimryptoSym.setSymmetricKey​(byte[] key)
      Set key for AES/GCM which is used for symmetrical encryption.
      byte[] vimryptoAsym.sign​(byte[] message)
